title: beautiful 2 story house at malabe
details:
new house, built 2 years ago
10,7 ph,
fully tiled,
5 bed rooms ( 2 bed rooms AC ),
3 bath rooms, 1 servant bath room,
spacious car porch,
living,dinning area and pantry with modern cupboards,
finishing roof,

very calm and quiet neighbourhood, highly residential area,
2 km to athurugiriya high way entrance,
nearest cities : athurugiriya ,arangala ,pittugala ,malabe, battaramulla
